    • 方法详细资料

      • receive

        List<V> receive(String topic,
              int partition,
              long beginOffset,
              long readOffset)

        Title: receive

        Description: Receive the msg from Kafka

        参数:
        topic - Topic name
        partition - Partition number
        beginOffset - Begin the offset index
        readOffset - Number of read messages
        返回:
        message

      • receiveWithKey

        Map<K,V> receiveWithKey(String topic,
                      int partition,
                      long beginOffset,
                      long readOffset)

        Title: receiveWithKey

        Description: Receive the msg from Kafka

        参数:
        topic - Topic name
        partition - Partition number
        beginOffset - Begin the offset index
        readOffset - Number of read messages
        返回:
        message

      • getLatestOffset

        long getLatestOffset(String topic,

        Title: getLatestOffset

        Description: Get latest offset number

        参数:
        topic - Topic name
        partition - Partition number
        返回:
        the latest offset
